Package net.royalur.model.state

Class PlayableGameState<P extends Piece,​S extends PlayerState,​R extends Roll>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.royalur.model.GameState<P,​S,​R>
      • net.royalur.model.state.OngoingGameState<P,​S,​R>
        • net.royalur.model.state.PlayableGameState<P,​S,​R>
  • Type Parameters:
    P - The type of pieces that are stored on the board in this game state.
    S - The type of state that is stored for each player.
    R - The type of rolls that may be stored in this game state.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    WaitingForMoveGameState, WaitingForRollGameState
    public abstract class PlayableGameState<P extends Piece,​S extends PlayerState,​R extends Roll>
extends OngoingGameState<P,​S,​R>
    A game state where we are waiting for interactions from a player.

    • Field Summary

      PlayableGameState​(GameStateType type, Board<P> board, S lightPlayer, S darkPlayer, Player turn)
      Instantiates a game state where the game is waiting for an interaction from a player to continue the game.

                         @Nonnull

                         @Nonnull
                         S darkPlayer,
                         @Nonnull
                         Player turn)
        Instantiates a game state where the game is waiting for an interaction from a player to continue the game.
        Parameters:
        type - The type of this game state, representing its purpose.
        board - The state of the pieces on the board.
        lightPlayer - The state of the light player.
        darkPlayer - The state of the dark player.
        turn - The player who can take the next action.
